text: Norman Ralph Augustine (born July 27, 1935) is an American aerospace businessman. He served as United States Under Secretary of the Army from 1975 to 1977. Augustine served as chairman of the Review of United States Human Space Flight Plans Committee. ==References== ==Other websites== *Review of U.S. Human Space Flight Plans Committee website Category:1935 births Category:Living people Category:United States Secretaries of the Army Category:Educators from Denver Category:Businesspeople from Denver
title: Norman R. Augustine
